AggregationIndex.index.title: Global Statistics
ClientTemplates.filter-dropdown.suggesti: "(The current result doesn't include resources with corresponding data)"
ClientTemplates.http_error.title: An error occured
ClientTemplates.place_widget.searchExpla: You can search for an address above. Simply type your address into the search field and choose the best fitting suggestion from the pull-down menu. If you cannot find your exact address, try omitting the house number or enter only the city. Then fill in the details and drag the pin to the correct location below.
CountryIndex.read.agreeConditions: I agree to publish the information above under the conditions of CC0-License. I assure, that I have all rights necessary to publish the information to grant this license.
CountryIndex.read.noChampion: There is no champion for %{country}, yet. Contact us if you can jump in!
LandigPage.index.welcome: Welcome to the OER World Map!
LandigPage.index.goal: Our goal is to provide the most complete and comprehensible picture of the global Open Educational Resources (OER) movement. Information is collected on people, organizations, services, projects and events related to OER.
LandigPage.index.contribute: Building the map is a collaborative process. You can contribute!
LandigPage.index.surveyMessage: Please take a moment to complete our user evaluation survey. Thank you!
ResourceIndex.Action.edit.addressMessage: The address of a project is inherited from the operator. That's why it's not shown per default. Only activate it, if this project is run in a different place then the operator is located.
ResourceIndex.Action.edit.readMore: Read more: FAQ Chapter: How to add locations?
ResourceIndex.Article.edit.skipMessage: If this story has already been published elsewhere, skip this and see below!
ResourceIndex.Article.edit.agreeStroyMes: I agree to publish this story under the Creative Commons Attribution license.
ResourceIndex.Article.edit.publishedTitl: This story was originally published at
ResourceIndex.Article.edit.agreeLicenseM: I agree to publish this story with the following license notice and assure that I have all rights necessary to publish the information to grant this license
ResourceIndex.Article.subtitle.originall: This article was originally published as %{exampleOfWork} at
ResourceIndex.Person.edit.message: Add a few details about yourself, your work and your expertise in just a few steps. Hit "publish" and others will find you and your work on the World Map!
ResourceIndex.Service.edit.info: The address of a service is inherited from the provider. That's why it's not shown per default. Only activate it, if this service is run in a different place then the provider is located.
ResourceIndex.Service.edit.readMore: Read more: FAQ Chapter: How to add locations?
ResourceIndex.index.agreeMessage: I agree to publish the information above under the conditions of CC0-License. I assure, that I have all rights necessary to publish the information to grant this license.
ResourceIndex.read.agree: I agree to publish the information above under the conditions of CC0-License. I assure, that I have all rights necessary to publish the information to grant this license.
ResourceIndex.read.provideNameMessage: You need to provide your name on your profile in order to comment.
ResourceIndex.read.lighthouses.title: Lighthouse Comments
ResourceIndex.read.lighthouses.text: Read why this entry is considered to be a lighthouse...
ResourceIndex.read.lighthouses.hint: You have to be logged in to add a lighthouse
ResourceIndex.read.like.hint: You have to be logged in to like an entry
UserIndex.groups.title: Administer Groups
UserIndex.newsletter.newsletterSignupTit: Subscribe to the OER World Map Newsletter
UserIndex.newsletter.newsletterSignupCal: Leave your email address so we can keep you posted!
UserIndex.newsletter.newsletterSignupPri: Don't worry, we won't put your email address on the map or share it with anyone else - check out our privacy policy.
UserIndex.password.message: Enter your current and desired password. After hitting the button you will be logged out.
UserIndex.passwordChanged.message: Password changed, you will be logged out in five seconds.
UserIndex.passwordReset.message: We've sent you an email with a temporary password. Please don't forget to change it after login.
UserIndex.register.loginMessage: When you click the login button your browser will present you a popup where you can enter your email address and password.
UserIndex.register.forgotPasswordMessage: Enter your email address, we will send you a temporary password.
UserIndex.register.name: Name
UserIndex.register.agreePolicy: By registering, I agree to the terms of the privacy policy. I specifically agree to publish the information I provide, except for my password, which will be stored securely. Your activities within OER World Map will also be stored and processed for the purpose of improving the service as well as to prove your consent to specific activities.
UserIndex.register.agreeService: I also agree to the Terms of the service. Especially, I will ensure, that no rights of others are violated by me publishing information through OER World Map. This includes the privacy and copyrights of others.
UserIndex.register.agreeEmail: I agree to having my email-address published as part of my profile
UserIndex.register.subscribe: I want to subscribe to the OER World Map Newsletter
UserIndex.registered.sentMessageNewslett: We just sent you two emails with verification links for the registration and the newsletter. Check your inbox.
UserIndex.registered.sentMessage: We just sent you an email with a verification link. Check your inbox.
UserIndex.verified.title: User %{username} verified
UserIndex.verified.message: User %{username} verified. Please sign in to edit your personal profile using the drop down menu in the upper right corner.
UserIndex.verified.signedMessage: I just signed up for the OER World Map
main.description: OER World Map shares information on behalf of the worldwide OER community, using local knowledge to describe the OER ecosystem.
main.skipProfile: Not now, take me to the map
main.joinUsMessage: Join us in mapping the world of OER!
resourceFormWidgets.place.countryCode: Country Code (DE, US, GB, ... to be replaced by dropdown)
app.closeQuestion: Are you sure you want to close? All form content will be lost.
name: Name
menu.hint: The OER World Map collects data related to Open Educational Resources (OER) and Open Education as described in the Cape Town Declaration and the 2012 OER Paris Declaration. Please add only related data. If not obvious, please outline the reference to OER in the description field.
menu.add.subtitle: What kind of entry would you like to add?
entry.missing.info.note: A description for this entry is missing.
entry.missing.info.action: Help us by adding some information!
Error.format: The provided format is not valid for the field %{format}
Diffs.description: Choose the left and right checkbox to select two versions which will be compared to each other.
Diffs.author: Author
Tour.types1: First, let's explore the data already added to the OER World Map.
Tour.types2: There are several different data types, let's take a look at them.
Tour.entries1: Just click on a data entry to see all of its associated information.
Tour.pins1: This is our pin switch. It is an essential navigation element, offering two different views of the World Map.
Tour.pins2: Click it to show or hide the pins on the map. When they are hidden, you can click on countries and access their data.
Tour.map1: When the pins are hidden, you can select a specific country and its regions.
Tour.add1: As an OER World Map user you can add and modify data entries.
Tour.add2: Every edit is valuable. Join us on our journey!
Tour.add3: To add a data entry, login and select "add" in the top bar menu.
Tour.feed1: You can find recent data entries in the Activity Feed.
Tour.end2: Register an account and explore other projects, people and ideas.
Tour.end3: Do you have questions or suggestions?
Tour.end5: We would love to hear from you!
